caseTitle: Collector of Customs v. M/s Faisal Enterprises
tagline: The question of invoking sub-section 5 of section 25 of the Customs Act 1969 does not arise at all if the value of the goods can be assessed on the basis of transaction value (the price actually paid or payable for the goods sold for export to Pakistan) under sub-section 1 of section 25 of the Customs Act 1969.
